sentences.en: Bruno is petty cagey . You have to keep an eye on him.
sentences.cn: 布鲁诺相当狡猾. 你是提防着他一点儿.

sentences.en: Don't be cagey or vague in headlines.
sentences.cn: 不要在标题上小心谨慎和含糊不清。

sentences.en: He gave a cagey, vague answer to my question.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼, 含糊其词地回答了我的问题.

sentences.en: He is cagey about what he was paid for the business.
sentences.cn: 他对自己在这桩买卖中所得的报酬不愿多提。

sentences.en: He remained cagey as to whether he would let Parker leave.
sentences.cn: 谈到是否愿意让帕克离开时他出言谨慎.

sentences.en: He was cagey , cagy about speaking of it.
He's very cagey about his family.
sentences.cn: 他对他家庭的事守口如瓶.

sentences.en: John is pretty cagey. You have to keep an eye on him.
sentences.cn: 约翰很谨慎小心的. 你必须留意他.

sentences.en: She's cagey about her past life.
sentences.cn: 她对自己过去的生活守口如瓶.

sentences.en: She's very cagey about her past life.
sentences.cn: 她对自己过去的生活讳莫如深.

sentences.en: The cagey fox could not be easily trapped by the farmer.
sentences.cn: 那只狡猾的狐狸不会轻易落入农夫的陷阱.

sentences.en: The old recluse was very cagey about her past life.
sentences.cn: 老隐士对自己过去的生活守口如瓶.

sentences.en: Tony is very cagey about his family.
sentences.cn: 托尼对自己家的事讳莫如深。

sentences.en: We can't play cagey and we have to go at them.
sentences.cn: 我们不能够小心奕奕地比赛,我们必须向他们作出反扑.

sentences.en: Yet he is cagey about this.

words.tran_cn: 小心谨慎的；机灵的（等于cagey）
精明地；谨慎小心地；狡诈地
精明的；小心谨慎的；机灵的；有戒心的

trans.tran_cn: <口>小心的，狡猾的，吞吞吐吐的，机灵的
trans.tran_en: unwilling to tell people about your plans, intentions, or opinions
